events.title: Hanami Walk!🌸
events.description:
🌸 NetWalking #10: Hanami Walk 🌸
🗓️ March 31st (Wed) @ 12 Noon!
❤️ Charity: ¥100 for each 1KM we walk (Optional!)

Course: Yanesen (Yanaka-Nezu-Sendagi)
📍 Meet at Sendagi Station, Exit 1
🌸 Explore Tokyo backstreets
🐼 End at Ueno Station

🌸 Peak sakura blossoms!
👟 Walk & talk with cool people

I'm an entrepreneur, but I'm also a dad.
I want to have dinner & tuck in my kids every night.

Typical after-work networking events aren't for me!
After 10+ events, I'm proud to say I'm not the only one😁

Date: March 31st (Monday)
Time: 12:00-2:00PM
Price: FREE
Charity: ¥100 for each 1KM we walk (Optional!)

Meeting Point: Sendagi Station, Exit 1
3-chōme-38 Sendagi, Bunkyo City, Tokyo 113-0022
https://maps.app.goo.gl/JNAF2fDxgayq2Uv57

events.title: Rainbow Bridge!🌈
events.description:
🇸🇪 🇯🇵 🇨🇦 🇻🇪 🇬🇧 🇺🇸
17,846: LinkedIn Followers
5,542: Meters Walked
2: Giant Statues 🤖 🗽
¥7,000 : Raised for Charity

[ Glokyo NetWalking 05: Rainbow Bridge ]

Perfect sunny & breezy day☀️
Thank you all for joining the walk!🙏

LinkedIn came in STRONG this time💪

99% of the new people I meet come from here😂
It's really cool to connect people!
(Even though I thought they were already connected😅)

Odaiba is a pretty remote location
So the fact that we could gather 7 professionals
At 12 on a Wed., shows me NetWalks are here to stay!❤️

See you next month!

events.title: Old to New!🏯
events.description:
0: 名刺 (Business cards)
7: Flags 🇳🇿🇩🇪🇮🇳🇦🇺🇧🇪🇫🇷🇺🇸
100,000+: Combined Steps

[ Glokyo NetWalking 3 ]

My philosophy for organizing club events:
Let people be the color in the room🎨

Sure, I decorated & set the time,
But nobody realized the obvious:
The people ARE the event🫵

We’re outdoors now, but it’s the same!

We walked from Asakusa to Sky Tree🗼
exchanging stories, laughs, & inspiration
(not business cards!)

Then everyone exchanged contacts and
made plans to hang out individually🤝
Real people. Real connections.

Thanks so much for coming!

events.title: Yoyogi Walk🍂
events.description:
🤝 10 total strangers
🌍 7 different countries
🚶 2+ laps around Yoyogi park
💖 ¥44300 raised for the Noto Earthquake

Thank you all for the INCREDIBLE afternoon!🙏 

What started as a random anti-忘年会 idea, 
Became a real fun, meaningful, and impactful event. 

This is definitely becoming a regular thing! 

Couple takeaways:
- Walk + Talk + 🌞 is a winning combo
- NOTHING beats meeting face-to-face 
- This is exactly the community I've been looking for 
- Don't assume everyone on LinkedIn knows each other😅
